attributes.action: Hardcore catch should have higher funding and be taught in schools
attributes.additional_details:
The game of hardcore catch should receive government grants to help the sport progress.  Furthermore, it should become a compulsory sport practised by our nations youth whilst at school.

The long-term aims of the increased funding/school participation would also be that the sport ultimately receives Olympic recognition, with the target of the sport becoming an Olympic event by 2028.

Funding would initially be used to set up a nationally recognized controlling body to help lay the foundations for this great nations future dominance of the sport.

Training academies and coaching systems could be set-up, and hopefully, within the near future, the very first Hardcore Catch Stadium could be built.
